args.natural_language_statement: Suppose A is an n-by-n matrix over a commutative ring (or field) α with det(A) = 0. Prove that the columns (or rows) of A are linearly dependent. Also if det(A) ≠ 0 prove that the columns (or rows) of A are linearly independent. Do this without Laplace expansion. Translate into Lean4 statement (no proof), using Mathlib. End the statement with := by sorry.

Also if det(A) ≠ 0 prove that the columns (or rows) of A are linearly independent. Do this without Laplace expansion. Translate into Lean4 statement (no proof), using Mathlib. End the statement with := by sorry. -/
theorem det_zero_iff_linear_depend

args.content:
import Mathlib

open Matrix

variable {n : Type*} [Fintype n] [DecidableEq n]
variable {α : Type*} [Field α]

theorem det_zero_cols_linear_dependent (A : Matrix n n α) (h : A.det = 0) :
  ¬ LinearIndependent α (fun j => A.col j) := by sorry

theorem det_nonzero_cols_linear_independent (A : Matrix n n α) (h : A.det ≠ 0) :
  LinearIndependent α (fun j => A.col j) := by sorry

theorem det_zero_rows_linear_dependent (A : Matrix n n α) (h : A.det = 0) :
  ¬ LinearIndependent α (fun i => A.row i) := by sorry

theorem det_nonzero_rows_linear_independent (A : Matrix n n α) (h : A.det ≠ 0) :
  LinearIndependent α (fun i => A.row i) := by sorry

args.content:
import Mathlib

open Matrix

variable {n : Type*} [Fintype n] [DecidableEq n]
variable {α : Type*} [Field α]

theorem det_zero_cols_linear_dependent (A : Matrix n n α) (h : A.det = 0) :
  ¬ LinearIndependent α (fun j => A.col j) := by sorry

theorem det_nonzero_cols_linear_independent (A : Matrix n n α) (h : A.det ≠ 0) :
  LinearIndependent α (fun j => A.col j) := by sorry

theorem det_zero_rows_linear_dependent (A : Matrix n n α) (h : A.det = 0) :
  ¬ LinearIndependent α (fun i => A.row i) := by sorry

theorem det_nonzero_rows_linear_independent (A : Matrix n n α) (h : A.det ≠ 0) :
  LinearIndependent α (fun i => A.row i) := by sorry
